32. Qc7 ! Black Resigns,
but after:
32...           Ke8
33.Qd7     Kf8
And 34. Qd8# Checkmate.

32...        Kf6
33. Qf7# Checkmate.

And if:
32...     Kf8
33. Qd8# Checkmate.

Nice isnt it?
Hehehe 
Im open for any challenge :)
Cya
